# Support

## Getting Help with RDAPify

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support:

## üìö Documentation

Before asking for help, please check our comprehensive documentation:

- **[Quick Start Guide](../QUICK_START_GUIDE.md)** - Get started in minutes
- **[Documentation](../docs/)** - Complete guides and API reference
- **[FAQ](../docs/troubleshooting/faq.md)** - Frequently asked questions
- **[Troubleshooting](../docs/troubleshooting/)** - Common issues and solutions

## üí¨ Community Support

### GitHub Discussions

For general questions, ideas, and community discussions:

- [Ask a Question](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/q-a)
- [Share Ideas](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/ideas)
- [Show and Tell](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/discussions/categories/show-and-tell)

### Community Chat

- **Discord**: https://discord.rdapify.com (coming soon)
- **Matrix**: https://matrix.to/#/#rdapify:matrix.org

### GitHub Issues

For bug reports and feature requests:

- [Report a Bug](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
- [Request a Feature](https://github.com/rdapify/rdapify/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

## üîí Security Issues

**DO NOT** open public issues for security vulnerabilities.

Instead, please email: **security@rdapify.com**

See our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for more details.

## üìß Direct Contact

For other inquiries:

- **General**: hello@rdapify.com
- **Enterprise**: enterprise@rdapify.com
- **Partnerships**: partnerships@rdapify.com
- **Press**: press@rdapify.com
- **Website**: https://rdapify.com

For a complete list of contacts, see [CONTACT.md](../CONTACT.md)

## üïê Office Hours

We hold weekly office hours for live support:

- **When**: Every Thursday at 2 PM UTC
- **Where**: https://meet.rdapify.com/office-hours (coming soon)
- **What**: Ask questions, get help, discuss features
- **Calendar**: Add to your calendar at https://rdapify.com/calendar

## üìñ Additional Resources

- [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [Roadmap](../ROADMAP.md)
- [Project Status](../PROJECT_STATUS.md)

## üåü Enterprise Support

For enterprise customers, we offer:

- Priority support with SLA
- Dedicated Slack/Discord channel
- Custom feature development
- Training and consulting

Contact: **enterprise@rdapify.com**

## ‚è±Ô∏è Response Times

We aim for the following response times:

| Channel          | Response Time          |
| ---------------- | ---------------------- |
| Security Issues  | Within 24 hours        |
| Bug Reports      | Within 48 hours        |
| Feature Requests | Within 1 week          |
| Discussions      | Best effort            |
| Email            | Within 3 business days |

## üôè Thank You

Thank you for using RDAPify! Your feedback helps us improve the project for everyone.
